installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl unzip ca-certificates
cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o samp.tar.gz http://files.sa-mp.com/samp037svr_R2-1.tar.gz
mkdir -p /mnt/server
tar -xzvf samp.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/
cp -r /mnt/server/samp03/* /mnt/server
rm -rf /mnt/server/samp03/
cd /mnt/server
chmod 777 samp03svr
sed -i '3d' /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "rcon_password changemeplease" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "Note To change some values go to startup, and change it!" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "Notas Para alterar alguns valores va para startup, e altere la!" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "output 1" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server
